SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationManager
This class manages various animations within a Brick Breaker game application.
Block
Represents an individual block in the BrickBreaker game.
BlockSerializable
Represents a block within a brick breaker game, designed for serialization.
BonusManager
Handles the management of bonuses in a Brick Breaker game.
GameBoardManager
Manages the game board layout for different levels in the Brick Breaker game.
GameController
The GameController class is responsible for managing the game state in the BrickBreaker game.
GameEngine
The GameEngine class orchestrates the main game loop, physics computations, and time tracking for a brick breaker game.
GameEngine.OnAction
 
GameOverScreen
Represents the game over screen in the Brick Breaker game.
LevelManager
Manages the levels and progression within the Brick Breaker game.
Main
The Main class represents the main entry point for the Brick Game application.
MainMenu
The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the game.
PauseMenu
Represents the in-game pause menu for the Brick Breaker game.
Score
The Score class is dedicated to the presentation and animation of score-related elements within the game.
SoundManager
Manages sound effects and background music for the Brick Breaker game.
SoundMenu
The SoundMenu class represents the in-game sound settings menu that provides options to adjust volume and mute/unmute audio.
UIManager
Manages the user interface elements for a Brick Breaker game.
YouWinScreen
Represents the "You Win" screen in the Brick Breaker game.
